roleset.name: make the noise of a hen/witch
roleset.note: CACKLE-V NOTES: Frame updated by Julia based on Brown. Member of VNcls animal_sounds-38, manner_speaking-37.3, nonverbal_expression-40.2. (from cackle.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: He stroked the hens and they responded with delighted clucks , he gobbled withthe turkeys and they at once were all attention , he quacked with the ducks ,and cackled with a pair of exceedingly flattered geese .
example.arg: with a pair of exceedingly flattered geese

example.name: John is pretty
example.text: ["I'll get you my pretty!"]-1 the witch cackled *trace*-1 at John.
